text: The 2015–16 season is Partick Thistle's third season in the Scottish Premiership, having been promoted from the Scottish First Division at the end of the 2012–13 season. Partick Thistle will also compete in the League Cup and the Scottish Cup. ==Results & fixtures== ===Scottish Premiership=== ===Scottish League Cup=== ===Scottish Cup=== ==Squad statistics== During the 2015–16 season, Partick Thistle have used twenty-five different players in competitive games.
